from typing import Final, TypedDict, TextIO, IO, cast\n\
import tempfile\n\
TEMP_FILE_TYPE: Final = typing.Type[TextIO]\n\
class TempFileData(TypedDict):\n    filepath: str\n    fileobj: TEMP_FILE_TYPE\n\
def create_temp_file() -> TempFileData:\n    with tempfile.TemporaryFile() as f:\n        return {'filepath': f.name, 'fileobj': cast(TEMP_FILE_TYPE, f)} \n```"

def read_from_temp_file(data: TempFileData) -> bytes:\n    return data['fileobj'].read() \n```"
